name: @stoplight/json-ref-resolver

1.0.2.name: @stoplight/json-ref-resolver
1.0.2.description: Recursively resolves JSON pointers and remote authorities.

scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.ts && typedoc --out docs --target es6 --theme minimal --mode file --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --excludeProtected src
scripts.test.prod: npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage --no-cache

hooks.pre-push: npm run test.prod && npm run build
